abstract: The board of Citigroup has awarded $6.65 million to Vikram S. Pandit after unexpectedly ousting the chief executive last month.
snippet: The board of Citigroup has awarded $6.65 million to Vikram S. Pandit after unexpectedly ousting the chief executive last month.
lead_paragraph: The board of Citigroup has awarded $6.65 million to Vikram S. Pandit after unexpectedly ousting the chief executive last month.

headline.main: Ousted Citi Chief to Receive $6 Million in ‘Incentive’ Pay
headline.print_headline: Ousted Citi Chief to Receive $6 Million in ‘Incentive’ Pay
